message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40%.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder.
Bob, my offer is getting worse with time. Let's settle this now - 55 for me, 45 for you.
Time is on my side, my offer isn't getting any better for you.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. It's a 50/50 split or nothing. The longer this goes on, the less we both get!
You're right, the longer this goes on, the less you get. I'm willing to take advantage of that.
